verses.verse: Then they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> are <S%H3898>fighting<s%> against <S%H7084>Keilah,<s%> and are <S%H8154>plundering<s%> the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floors.<s%>"

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Shall I <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H5221>attack<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>?" And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> and <S%H5221>attack<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H3467>deliver<s%> <S%H7084>Keilah.<s%>"

But David's <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> we are <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> <S%H637>How<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H637>more<s%> <S%H3588><s%> then <S%H3588>if<s%> we <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H4634>ranks<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>?"

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3254>once<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H3254>more.<s%> <S%H5750><s%> And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah,<s%> for I will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

So <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> and he <S%H5090>led<s%> <S%H5090>away<s%> their <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> them with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter.<s%> Thus <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3467>delivered<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, when <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> at <S%H7084>Keilah,<s%> [that] he <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> [with] an <S%H646>ephod<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

When it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H9330>delivered<s%> him into my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> for he <S%H5462>shut<s%> himself in by <S%H935>entering<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> with double <S%H1817>gates<s%> and <S%H1280>bars.<s%>"

So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>summoned<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> for <S%H4421>war,<s%> to <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> to <S%H6696>besiege<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men.<s%>

Now <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H9177>plotting<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him; so he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H5066>"Bring<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H5066>here.<s%>"

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> for <S%H8085>certain<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> is <S%H1245>seeking<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on my <S%H5668>account.<s%>

"Will the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> <S%H5462>surrender<s%> me into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>? Will <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%>? O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray,<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant.<s%>" And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "He will <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down.<s%>"

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Will the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> <S%H5462>surrender<s%> me and my <S%H376>men<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>?" And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "They will <S%H5462>surrender<s%> you."

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men,<s%> about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3318>departed<s%> from <S%H7084>Keilah,<s%> and they <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H834>wherever<s%> they could <S%H1980>go.<s%> When it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H4422>escaped<s%> from <S%H7084>Keilah,<s%> he <S%H2308>gave<s%> up the <S%H3318>pursuit.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> in the <S%H4679>strongholds,<s%> and <S%H3427>remained<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H2128>Ziph.<s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> him <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> did not <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Now <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7200>became<s%> <S%H7200>aware<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H3318>come<s%> out to <S%H1245>seek<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%> while <S%H1732>David<s%> was in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H2128>Ziph<s%> at <S%H2793>Horesh.<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> Saul's <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> at <S%H2793>Horesh,<s%> and <S%H2388>encouraged<s%> <S%H3027><s%> him in <S%H430>God.<s%>

Thus he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Do not be <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> my father shall not <S%H1>find<s%> you, and you will be <S%H4672>king<s%> <S%H4427>over<s%> <S%H5921>Israel<s%> and I will be <S%H3478>next<s%> to you; and <S%H4932>Saul<s%> my father <S%H7586>knows<s%> that <S%H1>also.<s%>"

So the <S%H8147>two<s%> of them <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> at <S%H2793>Horesh<s%> while <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Then <S%H2130>Ziphites<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> at <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Is <S%H1732>David<s%> not <S%H5641>hiding<s%> with us in the <S%H4679>strongholds<s%> at <S%H2793>Horesh,<s%> on the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H2444>Hachilah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H3225>south<s%> of <S%H3452>Jeshimon<s%>?

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> then, O <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H185>desire<s%> of your <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H3381>do<s%> <S%H3381>so;<s%> and our part [shall be] to <S%H5462>surrender<s%> him into the king's <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "May you be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> for you have <S%H2550>had<s%> <S%H2550>compassion<s%> on me.

<S%H1980>"Go<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> <S%H3559>make<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3559>sure,<s%> and <S%H3045>investigate<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> his <S%H7272>haunt<s%> is, [and] <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H7200>seen<s%> him <S%H8033>there;<s%> for I am <S%H559>told<s%> that he is <S%H6191>very<s%> <S%H6191>cunning.<s%>

"So <S%H7200>look,<s%> and <S%H3045>learn<s%> <S%H4480>about<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9255>hiding<s%> <S%H9255>places<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he <S%H2244>hides<s%> himself, and <S%H7725>return<s%> to me with <S%H3559>certainty,<s%> and I will <S%H1980>go<s%> with you; and it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H518>if<s%> he is in the <S%H776>land<s%> that I will <S%H2664>search<s%> him out among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>"

Then they <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H2128>Ziph<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul.<s%> Now <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> were in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4584>Maon,<s%> in the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> to the <S%H3225>south<s%> of <S%H3452>Jeshimon.<s%>

When <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> [him], they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and he <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H5553>rock<s%> and <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4584>Maon.<s%> And when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [it], he <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4584>Maon.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> on <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> on the <S%H2088>other<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H2648>hurrying<s%> to <S%H1980>get<s%> <S%H1980>away<s%> from <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> for <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> were <S%H9401>surrounding<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> to <S%H8610>seize<s%> them.

But a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4116>"Hurry<s%> and <S%H1980>come,<s%> for the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have <S%H6584>made<s%> a <S%H6584>raid<s%> on the <S%H776>land.<s%>"

So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H7291>pursuing<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H7121>called<s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> the <S%H5553>Rock<s%> of <S%H4256>Escape.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up from <S%H8033>there<s%> and <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in the <S%H4679>strongholds<s%> of <S%H5872>Engedi.<s%>
